## Worm.setShortestPath() method

Sets the shortest path property of the given session.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setShortestPath(session: number, path: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  session | number | The Worm session to be targeted. |
|  path | string | The path to set. Can only include valid symbols of the given session. |

**Returns:**

void
